# Themen






```{r}
modul_zsfg <- read_yaml("modul-zsfg.yaml")
```





```{r results='asis'}

titel <- modul_zsfg %>% names()

for (i in seq_along(titel)){
  
  this_title <- titel[i]
  cat("##", this_title, "\n")
  cat("\n")
  
  
  lernziele <- modul_zsfg[[i]][[1]]
  cat("### Lernziele \n")
  cat("\n")
  for (j in lernziele) {
    cat(paste0("- ", j))
    cat("\n")
  }
  
  cat("\n")
  cat("\n")
  
  
  literatur <- modul_zsfg[[i]][[2]]
  names_literatur <- names(literatur)
  cat("### Literatur \n\n")
  for (k in literatur) {
    chap <- literatur[[1]]
    cat(paste0("- ", names_literatur, ", Kapitel ", chap, "\n"))
    cat("\n")
  }
  
  cat("\n")
  cat("\n")
  
  videos <- 
    modul_zsfg[[2]][["videos"]]
  
  cat("### Videos \n\n")
  for (l in videos) {
    cat(paste0("- ", l, "\n"))
  }
  
  # Leerzeilen, bevor neues Thema anfÃ¤ngt
  cat("\n")
  cat("\n")
  
}
```
